title: Simplify Complex Code
description: Refactor the complex nested code to be simple and readable following the Zen of Python
solution:
# Refactored to be simple and readable
def process(x):
    if x is None or x <= 0 or x >= 100:
        return None
    return x * 2

# Test your refactored function
print(process(50))
print(process(-5))
print(process(None))
